Articles.Content:
I have KSP installed via Steam.

I stopped playing KSP for maybe four weeks and came back to continue my career mode game. There have been some updates, one of which is the inclusion of contracts, of which I am being offered none and another a budget of which I have 10 000 units. This is clearly an oversight. I have already been to Duna and its moon and back. I can't even exit the atmosphere for 10 000 units (maybe I can but I'm not going to try because I'm past that point and wish to proceed). Is it supposed to be an austerity simulation after a global recession or have I been moved to North Korea's space program or what?

Please give me funding commensurate with the science I have already gathered.

That's just a minor glitch from updating to the new version. You can give yourself commensurate funding, though. In the game, go to the Space Center. Open the Debug Menu (Alt+F12), then hold Alt for 5 seconds. It will let you add and subtract Science, Funds, and Reputation as you see fit.

I think I know your problem and how to solve it

why don't you change Career mode to science mode ( if you don't know science mode been added in the same update and it's like 0.23 and older versions career )

want to know how here is how : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86622-How-to-import-a-0-23-5-Career-save-into-0-24-Science-Mode
